attributes.action: Prime minister David Cameron to invoke article 50, not wait until October
attributes.additional_details: This should not be left until October, this should be done now
attributes.background:
The people of the United Kingdom have voted in the referendum of the 23rd June 2016.

It was shown by the vote that it is the will of the people of the United Kingdon to leave the EU

Our Prime Minister needs to carry this threw by invoking Article 50 to show our intention to leave immediately
